## Checklist

**Before submitting this PR, please ensure:**

### Code Quality
- [ ] My code follows the project's coding standards
- [ ] I have performed a self-review of my own code
- [ ] I have commented my code, particularly in hard-to-understand areas
- [ ] I have removed any console.log, debugger statements, and commented-out code
- [ ] My code passes all linting checks (`npm run lint`)
- [ ] My code is formatted correctly (`npm run format`)

### Testing
- [ ] I have added tests that prove my fix is effective or that my feature works
- [ ] New and existing unit tests pass locally with my changes (`npm test`)
- [ ] I have tested this change in different browsers (if UI change)
- [ ] I have tested this change with different user roles (if applicable)

### Documentation
- [ ] I have made corresponding changes to the documentation
- [ ] I have updated the CHANGELOG.md (if applicable)
- [ ] I have added/updated JSDoc comments for new functions

### Dependencies
- [ ] I have checked for security vulnerabilities in new dependencies
- [ ] I have verified that new dependencies are actively maintained
- [ ] I have minimized the number of new dependencies added

### Git
- [ ] My commits follow the [Conventional Commits](https://www.conventionalcommits.org/) format
- [ ] I have rebased my branch on the latest main/master
- [ ] I have resolved all merge conflicts
- [ ] My branch has a descriptive name (e.g., `feature/add-export`, `fix/login-bug`)

### Security
- [ ] I have not exposed any sensitive information (API keys, passwords, etc.)
- [ ] I have followed security best practices
- [ ] I have validated all user inputs
- [ ] I have handled errors appropriately
